subject: p16853729
Findings: AP and lateral views of the chest. Moderate cardiomegaly is stable. Widened mediastinum with tortuous aorta is unchanged. There is mild pulmonary vascular congestion, but no overt edema. No focal consolidation identified. No pneumothorax.
Impression: Moderate cardiomegaly. Mild pulmonary vascular congestion, but no overt edema.
